name: Wiki.js
short_description: Modern, lightweight wiki platform for creating and organizing knowledge bases.
description: Modern, lightweight wiki platform for creating and organizing knowledge bases. Wiki.js is a self-hosted application focused on documentation, wiki, notes, productivity. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Wiki.js on your home server to modern, lightweight wiki platform for creating and organizing knowledge bases without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Wiki.js to manage your documentation workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
